name: 4x4 Monster Truck Driving
description:
Do you love monster truck off road games? Welcome to 4x4 Monster Truck Driving. In this simulation game you can drive real 4x4 luxury vehicles. Become a legend among the monster truck legends and start driving on offroads in the hilly desert areas. Enjoy the real off Road driving simulator game with smooth steering controls of Monster Trucks.

GAME FEATURES:
- Real RC Monster Truck physics simulator.
- Extreme cool graphics.
- Extreme monster car driving experience
- Perfect car physics and car simulation
